name: namaste-react
description: This is Namaste React by Akshay Saini

scripts.__comment: to invoke the below commands (start, build, test) on the command prompt use npm run start or npm run build or npm run test
scripts.__comment2: on the command prompt you can write npx parcel index.html
scripts.__comment3: on the command prompt npx parcel build index.html

author: Mallikarjun
